Actions.Name: Convert Word to modern page
Actions.Description: Create a modern page from Word documents - https://xbridger.com/docs/getting-started/convert-word-to-modern-page/

Actions.Name: Convert Word to non-modern page
Actions.Description: Convert Word document to a simple aspx page -https://xbridger.com/docs/getting-started/convert-word-to-non-modern-page-overview

Actions.Name: Export list or library data to PDF
Actions.Description: Export list or library data to PDF. This operation supports 4 columns and one group parameter - https://xbridger.com/docs/getting-started/export-list-or-library-data-to-pdf/

Actions.Name: Merge documents to PDF
Actions.Description: Merge multiple documents format to pdf - https://xbridger.com/docs/getting-started/merge-documents-to-pdf/

Actions.Name: Merge Word documents
Actions.Description: Merge multiple Word documents into one - https://xbridger.com/docs/getting-started/merge-word-documents
